name: Mexican Museum
description: First US museum devoted exclusively to Mexican, Chicano, and Latino art. Collection of 16,000+ art objects (currently relocating to Yerba Buena).
fullDescription: First US museum devoted exclusively to Mexican, Chicano, and Latino art. Collection of 16,000+ art objects (currently relocating to Yerba Buena).
address: 2 Marina Boulevard Building D, San Francisco, CA 94102
